readme_content:
# console.log("Hello World!") - 🔭 I'm currently working on [my portfolio](https://github.com/mauroviveros/mauroviveros.github.io) - 🌱 I'm currently learning Astro, Golang, Flutter - 💼 I'm Web Developer & DevOps - 👯 I'm looking to collaborate on full stack web apps! - 🤝 I’m looking for help with Angular, Astro and Backend - 💬 Ask me about Websites, Basketball and Chess - 😄 Pronouns: he/him - ⚡ Fun fact: [object Object] ## 🧑‍💻 Skills

view more 👀
